name: overnighter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a single night spent away from home: My little boy has gone to his grandparents for an overnighter. We decided to do an overnighter in a hotel.
a journey that takes all night: No-one is in the best of moods after an overnighter on a cramped plane. After the Salt Lake City show they did an overnighter across the Rockies into Denver.
a train, bus, etc. that makes a journey through the night: The overnighter leaves Waterloo at 9.21pm on Friday and arrives at Bourg at 5.59am on Saturday.
a bag for things that you need when you stay away from home for a night: The bag collection includes a an overnighter, ideal for weekends away. I packed pyjamas, a change of underwear, and my phone into an overnighter.
